summary: WAS DRIVING ABOUT 45 MPH - HIT A POTHOLE & THE FRAME BROKE ON BOTH SIDES , BEHIND THE CAB !!!  ALMOST AN ACCIDENT     FRAME WAS ROTTED OUT FROM THE INSIDE !!!!  BUT I WASN'T ON INTERSTATE AT THE TIME  I CALLED TOYOTA U.S.A. ----THEY SAID -NOT THEIR PROBLEM !!!  I WOULD NOT WANT SOMEONE DRIVING ON CONGESTED FREEWAY AT A HIGH RATE OF SPEED & THIS HAPPENED   SOMEONE COULD BE KILLED !!!!!  *TR
